resume.skillmessage: Experience in designing, developing, deploying and maintaining highly available, scalable rest api's which are battle tested and performance optimized using java, nodejs and aws

education.degree: Bachelor's in Electronics and Communication Engineering

work.title: Engineer 2, Software Process engineering
work.description: Implemented nodejs backend services deployed on Kubernetes(EKS) using helm and worked on setting up infrastructure using Terraform for serving Global traffic. Used Apache Flink for real time stream processing with detections using CEP(complex event processing). Implemented and maintained in house CMS(Content Management System). Implemented indoor positioning system by proximity using beacons and worked on contact tracing for wearables

work.title: Server Engineer
work.description: Worked with GeoSpatial queries and GeoHashing for Geofence, Location aware based alerts. Used openstreetmaps, leaflet, google maps, here maps for geocoding and plotting. Worked on spring-boot micro-services, MQTT for IOT applications, Serverless lambda execution with function as a service model, Graphql end points, Quartz scheduler for sending geofence based time sheets through email service
